name: The Old Farmer
description:
You are a farmer, too old to work your fields. Give instructions to your worker to till the soil, plant seeds, and water crops.  Grow the products your customers request and earn coins to progress.

"Get to work!"

The Old Farmer features cute, simple graphics; fun sound and music; and relaxing gameplay. Take a load off and become a grumpy old farmer who yells at his poor worker to fulfil customer orders for fruit, vegetables, or flowers.

Customers patiently wait for the storeman to get their order.

This game was a short project, limited to one week. It was inspired partly by farming games such as Stardew Valley, partly by old school adventure games like Monkey Island, and partly by casual management sims.

The game features a tutorial level, a normal level, and an endless mode. Expect around 5 - 10 minutes of gameplay to reach endless mode.
